activities.loc: Courtroom D, Fourth Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ignacio Manuel Ramirez

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on November 14, 2022 at 08:45 am.
No contact directly or indirectly with victims HRP, AMP, DMZ, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No violent or disorderly conduct or discussion of case with victim BMP.

2:12 PM  Defendant Ignacio Manuel Ramirez in court.  Prosecuting attorney Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters not guilty plea.  Defendant wants to represent himself.  Court modifies bond to no violent contact with victim.  Not to talk about case.  Matter to be set.
A victim in this matter has requested to be notified and present at  all proceedings as well as the sentencing hearing
Adjourned initial appearance on August 31, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No contact with 800 Block of Elm Ave. in Beloit, WI. No contact directly or indirectly with victims HRP, AMP, BMP, or DMZ, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.

4:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ignacio Manuel Ramirez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz appeared by video for Ignacio Manuel Ramirez. Defendant address and date of birth verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $1000 with conditions.  No contact with 800 Block of Elm Ave. in Beloit, WI. No contact directly or indirectly with victims HRP, AMP, BMP, or DMZ, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
